section.title: Description
section.p: 'A native or naturalized member of a state or nation who owes allegiance to its government and is entitled to its protection' - Dictionary.com
"Contains the information related to a person's country citizenship. For country citizenship HL7 recommends using ISO table 3166...." - HL7 Version 2.8, PID-26.
"Identif(ies) the next of kin/associated party's citizenship." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-19.

stentry.p: The time period during which the person is/was a citizen of the associated Nation.

'A relatively large group of people organized under a single, usually independent government; a country.' - American Heritage Dictionary. An organization created to govern a country, which has the power to grant citizenship to its people.
"Contains the information related to a person's country citizenship. For country citizenship HL7 recommends using ISO table 3166...." - HL7 Version 2.8, PID-26.
"Identif(ies) the next of kin/associated party's citizenship." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-19.
